Title(s): On the Hours of the Cross
_description: William of Shoreham, On the Hours of the Cross, with an Invocation of ten lines

BLAdd17376.First Lines:
Þou open myne lippen lordLet felþe of senne out
                    wende…
BLAdd17376.Last Lines:
…So accordaunt to þy travaylLord graunte me þy
                    coroune. Amen.
BLAdd17376.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas. 
             The Poems of William of Shoreham.
Percy Society
         28. London: Richard, 1849: 82-9.
Konrath,  M.,
